vaccine|Shipments|ShipmentRegistry: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying each shipment record in the database.
vaccine|Shipments|TimeMark: A TIMESTAMP field indicating the exact date and time this shipment record was logged.
vaccine|Shipments|RouteAlign: A VARCHAR(30) descriptor for the routing alignment or path code used by the shipment.
vaccine|Shipments|CustomsFlag: An enum (CustomsFlag_enum) representing the customs clearance status (e.g., 'Cleared', 'In Process', 'Pending').
vaccine|Shipments|ImpPermitRef: A VARCHAR(50) referencing the import permit number or identifier for the shipment.
vaccine|Shipments|ExpPermitRef: A VARCHAR(50) referencing the export permit number or identifier for the shipment.
vaccine|Shipments|RegProfile: A VARCHAR(50) signifying the regulatory or profile reference for this shipment.
vaccine|Shipments|InsureFlag: An enum (InsuranceFlag_enum) capturing the insurance status (e.g., 'Active', 'Expired', 'Pending').
vaccine|Shipments|InsureRef: A VARCHAR(50) referencing the insurance policy or coverage document number.
vaccine|Shipments|QualCheck: An enum (QualityCheck_enum) indicating the quality check result (e.g., 'Failed', 'Passed', 'Pending').
vaccine|Shipments|IntegrityMark: An enum (IntegrityStatus_enum) showing the shipment’s integrity status (e.g., 'Intact', 'Under Investigation', 'Compromised').
vaccine|Shipments|ContamLevel: An enum (ContaminationRisk_enum) denoting potential contamination risk level (e.g., 'High', 'Low', 'Medium').
vaccine|Shipments|PackageState: An enum (PackageCondition_enum) describing the package condition (e.g., 'Excellent', 'Fair', 'Poor', 'Good').
vaccine|Shipments|SealFlag: An enum (SecuritySealStatus_enum) for the security seal status (e.g., 'Broken', 'Intact', 'Missing').
vaccine|Shipments|SealRef: A VARCHAR(50) referencing a security seal ID or documentation.
vaccine|Shipments|TamperSign: An enum (TamperEvidence_enum) noting tampering evidence (e.g., 'None Detected', 'Suspected', 'Confirmed').
vaccine|Shipments|HandlingGuide: A TEXT field for special handling instructions or guidelines for the shipment.
vaccine|Shipments|StoragePose: A VARCHAR(40) specifying how the shipment must be positioned or oriented during storage/transport.
vaccine|Shipments|GeneralNote: A TEXT field for any additional free-form notes regarding the shipment.
vaccine|Container|ContainRegistry: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying each container record.
vaccine|Container|ContainModel: A VARCHAR(40) naming or describing the container model/type.
vaccine|Container|VolLiters: An INTEGER specifying the container's internal volume in liters.
vaccine|Container|MassKg: A REAL number for the container’s mass in kilograms (when empty, if applicable).
vaccine|Container|ContainFlag: A VARCHAR(30) field capturing a container status or classification (e.g., ‘In Transit’, ‘Active’, ‘Return’, ‘Delivered’).
vaccine|Container|CoolKind: A VARCHAR(40) describing the coolant type used within the container (e.g., Dry Ice, Liquid Nitrogen, Phase Change Material).
vaccine|Container|CoolMass: A REAL number indicating the mass (in kilograms) of the coolant present.
vaccine|Container|CoolRemainPct: A DECIMAL(5,2) representing the remaining percentage of coolant.
vaccine|Container|CoolRefills: A SMALLINT count of how many times coolant has been refilled.
vaccine|Container|RefillLatest: A DATE recording the most recent coolant refill date.
vaccine|Container|RefillNext: A DATE for the scheduled or expected next refill date.
vaccine|Container|BatteryPct: A REAL percentage of the container’s internal battery level, if battery-powered components exist.
vaccine|Container|PwrFeed: A VARCHAR(40) indicating the primary power feed or source (e.g., Battery, External, Hybrid).
vaccine|Container|PwrBackupFlag: A VARCHAR(40) specifying backup power availability status (e.g., Available, In Use, Not Available).
vaccine|Container|ShipOwn: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Shipments(ShipmentRegistry). Links this container to a shipment.
vaccine|TransportInfo|VehicleReg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying the transport vehicle record.
vaccine|TransportInfo|VehicleKind: An enum (VehicleKind_enum) describing the vehicle type (e.g., 'Refrigerated Truck', 'Cargo Aircraft', 'Reefer Container').
vaccine|TransportInfo|VehTempC: A REAL number for the current measured temperature (°C) inside the vehicle.
vaccine|TransportInfo|SpeedKm: A REAL number specifying the vehicle’s current speed in km/h.
vaccine|TransportInfo|DistDoneKm: A NUMERIC(9,2) indicating the distance already traveled (in kilometers).
vaccine|TransportInfo|DistLeftKm: A NUMERIC(9,2) specifying the remaining distance (in kilometers) until destination.
vaccine|TransportInfo|ETA: A TIMESTAMP for the estimated time of arrival at the destination.
vaccine|TransportInfo|DepartSite: A VARCHAR(100) naming the departure location/site.
vaccine|TransportInfo|CurrentSite: A VARCHAR(100) for the current location or site.
vaccine|TransportInfo|DestSite: A VARCHAR(100) naming the destination location/site.
vaccine|TransportInfo|GPSFlag: An enum (GPSTrackingStatus_enum) for GPS tracking status (e.g., 'Active', 'Lost', 'Limited').
vaccine|TransportInfo|LatValue: A DOUBLE PRECISION value for the vehicle’s current latitude.
vaccine|TransportInfo|LonValue: A DOUBLE PRECISION value for the vehicle’s current longitude.
vaccine|TransportInfo|AltMeter: A REAL number denoting the vehicle’s altitude in meters above sea level.
vaccine|TransportInfo|LocUpdateMin: A SMALLINT specifying how frequently (in minutes) the vehicle’s location data is updated.
vaccine|TransportInfo|LocUpdateMark: A TIMESTAMP noting the last recorded location update time.
vaccine|TransportInfo|TransMode: An enum (TransportMode_enum) indicating the mode of transport (e.g., 'Road', 'Rail', 'Air', 'Sea').
vaccine|TransportInfo|CarrLabel: A TEXT field with carrier or transporter identification/labeling information.
vaccine|TransportInfo|CarrCert: A VARCHAR(50) referencing any carrier certification or license number.
vaccine|TransportInfo|ShipTransit: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Shipments(ShipmentRegistry). Links vehicle to a shipment in transit.
vaccine|TransportInfo|ContainTransit: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Container(ContainRegistry). Links the vehicle to a container in transit.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|VacRegistry: A SERIAL primary key that uniquely identifies each vaccine detail record.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|VacVariant: A VARCHAR(50) naming the vaccine type or variant (e.g., ‘Viral Vector’, ‘mRNA’, ‘Inactivated’, ‘Protein Subunit’).
vaccine|VaccineDetails|MfgSource: A TEXT field describing the manufacturer or source information of the vaccine.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|BatchLabel: A VARCHAR(50) specifying the batch or lot number label.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|ProdDay: A DATE indicating the production/manufacture date of the vaccine batch.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|ExpireDay: A DATE specifying the vaccine’s expiration date.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|LotMeasure: A BIGINT representing the quantity or measure of this vaccine lot (e.g., total units produced).
vaccine|VaccineDetails|VialTally: A SMALLINT counting how many vials are included in this particular batch.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|DosePerVial: A SMALLINT indicating the number of individual doses contained in each vial.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|DoseTotal: An INTEGER summing the total doses in this record (VialTally × DosePerVial).
vaccine|VaccineDetails|ShipInject: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Shipments(ShipmentRegistry), tying this vaccine detail to a shipment.
vaccine|VaccineDetails|ContainVac: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Container(ContainRegistry), linking vaccine details to a specific container.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|RegMain: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each regulatory/maintenance record.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|MaintFl: A VARCHAR(20) showing the maintenance status (e.g., ‘Overdue’, ‘Up to Date’, ‘Due’).
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|MaintDa: A DATE indicating the date of the most recent maintenance operation.
A DATE specifying the scheduled or expected date for the next maintenance.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|CalibDa: A DATE for the most recent calibration event.
A DATE for the next scheduled calibration.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|CompSco: A REAL number reflecting a compliance or condition score assigned to the shipment/vehicle.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|RiskFla: A VARCHAR(50) denoting risk level or category (e.g., ‘High Risk’, ‘Low Risk’, ‘Medium Risk’).
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|Inciden: A SMALLINT counting the number of recorded incidents or violations.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|Resolve: A VARCHAR(50) specifying how or if those incidents were resolved.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|RespPer: A VARCHAR(100) naming the responsible person or officer in charge.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|Contact: A VARCHAR(50) for the primary contact phone/ID.
A VARCHAR(50) for emergency contact phone/ID details.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|Inspect: A DATE showing when the last official inspection was completed.
A DATE specifying when the next inspection is scheduled or due.
A VARCHAR(50) describing the overall outcome or result of the last inspection.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|Correct: A TEXT field detailing corrective actions taken post-inspection or post-incident.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|Prevent: A TEXT field describing preventive measures planned or implemented.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|ValidFl: A VARCHAR(20) indicating the current validity status (e.g., 'In Process', 'Validated', 'Failed').
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|VerifyM: A VARCHAR(50) naming the verification method or standard used.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|ShipGov: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Shipments(ShipmentRegistry), linking this record to a shipment.
vaccine|RegulatoryAndMaintenance|VehGov: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing TransportInfo(VehicleReg), linking this record to a vehicle.
vaccine|SensorData|SensorTrack: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each sensor data record.
vaccine|SensorData|StoreTempC: A REAL value indicating the recommended or target storage temperature in Celsius.
vaccine|SensorData|TempTolC: A DECIMAL(4,1) specifying allowable temperature deviation (±°C).
vaccine|SensorData|TempNowC: A REAL number for the current actual temperature reading in Celsius.
vaccine|SensorData|TempDevCount: A SMALLINT counting how many times the temperature has deviated beyond the allowed tolerance.
vaccine|SensorData|TempMaxC: A DECIMAL(5,2) representing the maximum temperature recorded (in °C).
vaccine|SensorData|TempMinC: A DECIMAL(5,2) representing the minimum temperature recorded (in °C).
vaccine|SensorData|TempStabIdx: A REAL value indicating a temperature stability index or coefficient.
vaccine|SensorData|HumidityPct: A DECIMAL(4,1) showing the percentage of humidity inside or around the container.
vaccine|SensorData|PressKPA: A REAL number representing the recorded pressure in kilopascals (kPa).
vaccine|SensorData|ShockFlag: An enum (SensorStatus_enum) describing the shock sensor status (e.g., Normal, Malfunction, Triggered).
vaccine|SensorData|TiltFlag: An enum (SensorStatus_enum) describing the tilt sensor status (e.g., Normal, Triggered, Malfunction).
vaccine|SensorData|ImpactFlag: An enum (SensorStatus_enum) describing the impact sensor status (e.g., Normal, Triggered, Malfunction).
vaccine|SensorData|VibeLvlMms: A DECIMAL(6,2) measuring vibration level in mm/s (millimeters per second).
vaccine|SensorData|LightLux: An INTEGER for the current or last known light level in lux.
vaccine|SensorData|AccelData: A REAL value capturing acceleration data (e.g., in m/s²) from the sensor.
vaccine|SensorData|HandleEvents: A SMALLINT counting non-critical handling events (minor jolts, slight tilts).
vaccine|SensorData|CritEvents: A SMALLINT recording critical events (major shocks, severe impacts).
vaccine|SensorData|Alerts: A SMALLINT tally of all sensor alerts triggered within a specific timeframe.
vaccine|SensorData|AlertTime: A TIMESTAMP marking the most recent alert event time.
vaccine|SensorData|AlertKind: A VARCHAR(50) describing the kind or category of the last triggered alert.
vaccine|SensorData|ContainLink: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Container(ContainRegistry). Associates sensor data with a specific container.
vaccine|SensorData|VehSenseRef: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing TransportInfo(VehicleReg). Links sensor data to a particular vehicle.
vaccine|DataLogger|LoggerReg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying each data logger record.
vaccine|DataLogger|LogFlag: An enum (DataLoggerStatus_enum) indicating the logger’s status (e.g., 'Malfunction', 'Battery Low', 'Active').
vaccine|DataLogger|LogInterval: A SMALLINT specifying the frequency (in minutes) at which the logger records or transmits data.
vaccine|DataLogger|TransmitFlag: An enum (TransmissionStatus_enum) indicating the data transmission status (e.g., 'Failed', 'Real-time', 'Delayed').
vaccine|DataLogger|DataUpTime: A TIMESTAMP showing the logger’s current or last recorded operational uptime reading.
vaccine|DataLogger|DataPct: A REAL value reflecting the logger’s used data capacity or data completeness in percentage.
vaccine|DataLogger|BatterySwap: A DATE noting when the data logger battery was last replaced or swapped.
vaccine|DataLogger|FirmVers: A VARCHAR(50) naming the firmware version installed on the data logger.
vaccine|DataLogger|SoftUpdate: A TEXT field for recording any software update notes or logs.
vaccine|DataLogger|SysHealth: An enum (SystemHealth_enum) describing the logger’s system health (e.g., 'Poor', 'Fair', 'Good').
vaccine|DataLogger|MemUsePct: A SMALLINT for the percentage of the logger’s internal memory currently in use.
vaccine|DataLogger|StoreCapMB: An INTEGER representing the logger’s total storage capacity in megabytes.
vaccine|DataLogger|StoreRemainMB: An INTEGER indicating remaining/free storage in megabytes.
vaccine|DataLogger|NetSignal: An enum (NetworkSignal_enum) representing network signal strength (e.g., 'Poor', 'Good', 'Excellent').
vaccine|DataLogger|CommProto: A VARCHAR(20) naming the communication protocol (e.g., RF, Bluetooth, Satellite, GSM).
vaccine|DataLogger|SyncFreqHr: A SMALLINT indicating how often (in hours) synchronization is attempted or performed.
vaccine|DataLogger|ContainLog: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Container(ContainRegistry). Connects the data logger to a container.
vaccine|DataLogger|ShipLog: A VARCHAR(20) foreign key referencing Shipments(ShipmentRegistry). Optionally links the data logger to a shipment.
